alert.note: Alert for Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:47PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Victoria County through 630 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Telferner, or near Victoria, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Guadalupe, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Dacosta, Wood Hi, Victoria Detar Hospital North, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Brentwood Subdivision, Inez, Salem, Victoria Regional Airport, Telferner, Ball Airport Area and Downtown Victoria. This includes the following highways... US Highway 59 between mile markers 622 and 640. US Highway 77 between mile markers 570 and 576. US Highway 87 between mile markers 808 and 824. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
